info.name: Kasera General Store
info.description: This has to the documentation of all the backend apis and respective contracts.

item.name: Onboarding User APIs

request.description:
This api is used to send the opt to the given phone no.

No authentication in this API
This api is used to verify the otp.
This api is used to register the user to the system and linking ofthe auth done preivously.

This endpoint allows the user to log out by sending an HTTP POST request to the specified URL.

### Response

The response for this request is a JSON object with the following properties:

- `statusCode` (number): The status code of the response.
    
- `message` (string): A message related to the response.
    

Example response:

``` json
{
    "statusCode": 0,
    "message": ""
}

 ```

### Login API

This API endpoint allows users to authenticate and obtain a token for accessing protected resources.

#### Request Body

- `userName` (string, required): The username of the user.
    
- `password` (string, required): The password of the user.
    

#### Response

The response is a JSON object with the following properties:

- `statusCode` (number, required): The status code of the response.
    
- `errorMessage` (string, optional): The error message, if any.
    
- `message` (string, optional): Additional message related to the response.
    
- `responseBody` (object, optional): The response body object.
    
    - `token` (string, required): The authentication token.
        
    - `status` (string, required): The status of the authentication.
        
    - `existing` (boolean, required): Indicates if the user already exists.
        

#### Example Response

``` json
{
  "statusCode": 0,
  "errorMessage": "",
  "message": "",
  "responseBody": {
    "token": "",
    "status": "",
    "existing": true
  }
}

 ```

item.description: All the APIs that can be used to onboard an user. An user can be customer or employee. The API specific details are available in the requests of the same.

body.raw:
{
    "addressLine1":"plot no 12, xyz colony", 
    "addressLine2":"abc road",
    "landmark":"near pql complex",
    "city":"mumbai",
    "state":"maharashtra",
    "pincode":"345213",
    "addressName":"house 1",
    "primaryAddress":true
}

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add a new address to the user's profile. The HTTP POST request should be sent to [http://localhost:8801/v1/profile/address/add](http://localhost:8801/v1/profile/address/add) with the following request body parameters:

- addressLine1 (string, required): The first line of the address.
- addressLine2 (string,): The second line of the address.
    
- landmark (string,): A landmark near the address.
    
- city (string, required): The city of the address.
- state (string, required): The state of the address.
- pincode (string, required): The pincode of the address.
- addressName (string, required): A name to identify the address.
- primaryAddress (boolean): Indicates if the address is the primary address.
    

### Example Response

``` json
{
    "statusCode": 0,
    "message": "",
    "responseBody": {
        "landmark": "",
        "addressLine1": "",
        "city": "",
        "state": "",
        "pincode": "",
        "addressName": "",
        "primaryAddress": true
    }
}

 ```
